newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria Natbank calls for repo bids at same 3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Austria Natbank calls for repo bids at same 3 pct.

text.p: The Austrian National Bank said on Thursday it would leave key interest rates unchanged and called for bids on one-week securities repurchase agreements at an unchanged rate of 3.0 percent.
Bids have to be in by 1300 GMT on Friday.
Last week, the central bank allotted 8.68 billion schillings, or 10 percent of bids, in repos.
Austria's discount rate remains at 2.5 percent, the Lombard rate at 4.75 percent and the Gomex money market rate at 3.4 percent. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12 274
